com.inqwell.any.beans

Interface ListenerAdaptee

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractButtonGroup, AnyArrowButton, AnyBox, AnyButton, AnyButtonGroup, AnyCAction, AnyCard, AnyCButtonGroup, AnyCCheck, AnyCDockable, AnyCDropDown, AnyCheck, AnyCMenu, AnyComboBox, AnyComponent, AnyCPanelPopup, AnyCRadio, AnyDateChooser, AnyDesktopPane, AnyDialog, AnyDocView, AnyFileChooser, AnyFrame, AnyGrid, AnyInternalFrame, AnyLabel, AnyLabelFor, AnyLayoutContainer, AnyList, AnyMenu, AnyMenuBar, AnyMultipleCDockable, AnyPopupMenu, AnyProgressBar, AnyRadio, AnySelection, AnySimpleComponent, AnySingleCDockable, AnySlider, AnySortView, AnySpinner, AnySplit, AnyTabbedPane, AnyTable, AnyText, AnyToggleButton, AnyToolBar, AnyTree, AnyView, AnyWindow

    public interface ListenerAdaptee
    Define the operations to be supported by classes which adapt events from external sub-systems, usually written to the JDK event idiom of event type == java class, to that of the Any framework, where the event type is carried inside implementations of the Event interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adaptEvent(Event e)
      Receive an Any event from an adapter to an external component.
      void addAdaptedEventListener(EventListener l)
      Route an adapted event received at this to the given listener
      void addAdaptedEventListener(EventListener l, Any eventParam)
      Route an adapted event received at this to the given listener with the supplied parameter.
      void removeAdaptedEventListener(EventListener l)
